title: R&D Pedagogical Workshop for Developing Social Integration Education Models

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory knowledge, understanding of social studies pedagogy, and multicultural education experience
context.additional_context: Practical development of a regionally rooted social integration education model using VR simulations.

learning_goals: Participants can develop social integration education programs by applying the Borg & Gall instructional design model and ADDIE phases.
Participants can design educational content utilizing local cultural elements (e.g., Pelaga-Gandong) in a VR-based simulation environment
Participants can analyze the effectiveness of the developed educational model through formative evaluation and propose improvements
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
